data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10_item_regional_hdr
data.value: Tip #2: Adjust the regional settings

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10_item_regional
data.value: Choose the language and set the correct time zone. It's particularly important for the notifications and the correct calendar work. Go to Settings >> Common >> Customization.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10_item_brand_hdr
data.value: Tip #1: Brand it

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10_item_brand

data.value: Create a single workspace for all your docs

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10_item_customize_hdr

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10_item_customize

data.name: LinkLearnMore
data.value: Learn More >>

data.name: pattern_activate_email
data.value:
h1.Activate your email for "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal.
Hello!
To start participating in the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal life you need to activate your email address. This is done for security reasons.
$GreenButton
This link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email activation within that period.

data.name: pattern_admin_voip_blocked
data.value: h1.Message from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" VoIP disabled

data.name: pattern_admin_voip_warning
data.value:
h1.Message from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
VoIP Balance: $Body

data.name: pattern_backup_created
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal backup created
Dear $OwnerName,
A backup file containing data from your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal has been created.
To learn more on the backup procedure please refer to our "Data backup":"${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/data-backup-restore.aspx" user guide.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support.lexic.xyz":"http://support.lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_change_email
data.value:
h1.Email address change request
You have requested to change your email address used to enter the ${LetterLogoText} portal.
Please follow the link below to change your email address:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email change process within that period.
You might need your old email address to access the portal when you follow the link. If you do not remember the old email address, please contact your portal administrator.
If you do not want to change your email or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_change_password
data.value:
h1.Password change request for the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
There has been a request to change your password used to enter the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
Please follow the link below to change your password:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the password change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your password or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_change_phone
data.value:
h1.Mobile phone change request
You have requested to change your mobile phone used to enter the ${LetterLogoText} portal.
Please follow the link below to change your mobile phone:
$GreenButton
If you do not want to change your mobile phone or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_change_tfa
data.value:
h1.Backup codes change request
You have requested to change your backup codes used to enter the ${LetterLogoText} portal.
Please follow the link below to change your backup codes:
$GreenButton

data.name: pattern_confirm_owner_change
data.value:
h1.Change of "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal owner
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal owner to $UserName.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal owner change process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_dns_change
data.value:
h1.Change of portal address
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal address to "$PortalAddress":"$PortalAddress" #if($PortalDns != "") ("$PortalDns":"$PortalDns" )#end.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal address change process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_for_admin_notify
data.value:
h1.Message from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
Email: $UserEmail
$Body

data.name: pattern_join
data.value:
h1.Invitation to join "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal
Hello,
You have requested to join the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal at ${LetterLogoText} - a platform for document and project management. Join the portal and start collaborating with your colleagues or friends right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 48 hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_created
data.value: Dear $UserName, Administrator has created a new $Address mailbox for you at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Use the following settings for other email clients: Login: $Login Password: "set password":"$MyStaffLink" Incoming Mail (IMAP): Server: $Server Port: $ImapPort SSL/TLS: $Encryption Outgoing Mail (SMTP): Server: $Server Port: $SmtpPort SSL/TLS: $Encryption Requires Authentication: Yes If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_without_settings_created
data.value: Dear $UserName, Administrator has created a new $Address mailbox for you at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_password_changed
data.value: Dear $UserName, The password for the $Address mailbox has been changed. If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_migration_error
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration error
An error has occurred while migrating to the $RegionName region. Please, try once again later. Your portal is now available at the old address "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_migration_server_failure
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration error
An error has occurred while migrating to another region. Please, try once again later. Your portal is now available at the old address "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_migration_start
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration started
The portal migration to the $RegionName region is started. It might take some time depending on your data amount.
*Note*: the portal will not be available during the migration process. After the migration is complete the portal URL will be changed and all the shared documents links will be inaccessible.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.^

data.name: pattern_migration_success
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration successfully completed
The portal migration to the $RegionName region is successfully completed. Your portal is now available at "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl" portal.^

data.name: pattern_portal_deactivate
data.value:
h1.Deactivation of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested a temporary deactivation of your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deactivation process within that period.
You can reactivate your portal any time by clicking the following link: p=. "Reactivate Portal":"$ActivateUrl" (this link has no time limit)
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_portal_delete
data.value:
h1.Deletion of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested to permanently delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
*Important! All the data stored on your portal, as well as your registration details will be lost and cannot be recovered.*
#if($AutoRenew == "True") Before you delete the portal, please make sure that automatic billing is turned off. You may check the status of automatic billing in your "Avangate account":"https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/". #end
If you still want to delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_portal_delete_success_v10
data.value:
Your LEXIC has been successfully deactivated. Please note that all of your data will be deleted in accordance with "our Privacy statement":"https://help.lexic.xyz/products/files/doceditor.aspx?fileid=5048502&doc=SXhWMEVzSEYxNlVVaXJJeUVtS0kyYk14YWdXTEFUQmRWL250NllHNUFGbz0_IjUwNDg1MDIi0".
Why have you decided to leave? Share your experience with us.
$GreenButton
Thank you and good luck!
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_portal_rename
data.value:
h1.Change of portal address
Dear $UserDisplayName,
Your $PortalUrl portal address was changed to the new "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" address.
*Note*: All the shared documents links are inaccessible now, as well as DNS settings and single sign-on options stop working until you change them. The third party iCal links added to your calendar will also stop updating until you reload them.

data.name: pattern_profile_delete
data.value:
h1.Removal of the profile from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
You have requested to permanently delete your profile from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
If you still want to delete your profile please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the profile deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_profile_updated
data.value:
h1.Your profile at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" has been changed
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile details at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" have been changed by "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl".
To view your profile follow the link below: "$UserName":"$MyStaffLink"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.^

data.name: pattern_request_license
data.value:
h1.Enterprise license request
h3.First name $UserName
h3.Last name $UserLastName
h3.Position $Position
h3.Email "$UserEmail":"mailto:$UserEmail"
h3.Phone $Phone
h3.Company Website $Website
h3.Company name $CompanyTitle
h3.Company size $CompanySize
h3.Request content $Body
h3.Portal address "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}"

data.name: pattern_request_tariff
data.value:
h1.SAAS pricing plan request for "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}"
h3.Name $UserName
h3.Email "$UserEmail":"mailto:$UserEmail"
h3.Request content $Body

data.name: pattern_restore_started
data.value:
h1.Portal restoration started
The portal restoration is started. It might take some time depending on your data amount.
*Note*: the portal will not be available during the restoration process.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Best regards, LEXIC™ Support Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_self_profile_updated
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal profile change notification
"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has changed his/her profile details at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.

data.name: pattern_send_whats_new
data.value:
h1.What's new on "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal for $Date
#foreach($activity in $Activities)
h2.$activity.Key
#foreach($whatsNewActivity in $activity.Value) #foreach($b in $whatsNewActivity.BreadCrumbs) h3.$b #end "$whatsNewActivity.Title":"$whatsNewActivity.URL" *Author*: "$whatsNewActivity.UserName":"$whatsNewActivity.UserAbsoluteURL", $whatsNewActivity.Action: $whatsNewActivity.Date.ToShortTimeString()
#end
#end

data.name: pattern_smtp_test
data.value:
SMTP test message
This message was generated automatically to test your SMTP settings. If you are viewing it this means that the settings are correct and you can use them on your portal.
Best regards, LEXIC Team

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_activation_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
You have just created the LEXIC portal, your team's cloud office that would enhance internal cooperation. Its address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
Please, confirm your email:
$GreenButton
The link will be valid for 7 days.
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: subject_saas_admin_activation_v10
data.value: Welcome to LEXIC cloud!

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_activation_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
You have just created the LEXIC portal, your team's cloud office that would enhance internal cooperation. Its address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
Please, confirm your email:
$GreenButton
You may change your email or password in your "personal profile page":"$MyStaffLink".
To send notifications, we use the SMTP settings of LEXIC mail server. To change them, please follow the instructions "here":"${__HelpLink}/server/windows/community/smtp-settings.aspx".
More information in LEXIC "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".

data.name: subject_enterprise_admin_activation_v10
data.value: Confirm your email

data.name: pattern_enterprise_whitelabel_admin_activation_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
You have just created your corporate web-office, your team's cloud office that would enhance internal cooperation. Its address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
Please, confirm your email:
$GreenButton
You may change your email or password in your "personal profile page":"$MyStaffLink".

data.name: subject_enterprise_whitelabel_admin_activation_v10
data.value: Confirm your email

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_welcome_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Here’s what you can do to make your web-office even more secure:
*Get an SSL certificate* if you are going to provide not only local but also external portal access for your users. Generate a new signed certificate in the Control Panel or purchase one from the provider you trust.
*Enable automatic backups* in the Control Panel. We also recommend that you use third-party services and make a backup copy of the server with LEXIC installed from time to time. Instructions in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}/server/controlpanel/enterprise/backup-restore.aspx".
*Adjust portal security settings*: restrict access using IP whitelisting, specify trusted mail domains, set password length and more. "More information >>":"${__HelpLink}/server/enterprise/configure-enterprise.aspx"
*Enable 2-factor authentication* via SMS or authenticator app. Instructions "here":"${__HelpLink}/guides/two-factor-authentication.aspx".
*Use LDAP for access centralization*. Easily import the necessary users and groups from your LDAP server (e.g. OpenLDAP Server or Microsoft Active Directory) to your portal. Learn more "here":"${__HelpLink}/server/windows/community/ldap-settings.aspx".
*Use own SMPT server*. By default notifications for LEXIC Enterprise Edition users (for example, if they are granted access to a document) are provided by means of standard LEXIC SMPT server. Configure your own SMTP server so that your notifications won’t pass through any third-party server. "Instructions >>":"${__HelpLink}/server/enterprise/configure-enterprise.aspx"
*Close all the unnecessary ports*. The list of all the ports which must be opened for LEXIC is "here":"${__HelpLink}/server/docker/community/open-ports.aspx".
Make your LEXIC more secure now.
$GreenButton
More information in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".

data.name: pattern_enterprise_whitelabel_admin_welcome_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Here’s what you can do to make your web-office even more secure:
*Get an SSL certificate* if you are going to provide not only local but also external portal access for your users. Generate a new signed certificate in the Control Panel or purchase one from the provider you trust.
*Enable automatic backups* in the Control Panel. We also recommend that you use third-party services and make a backup copy of the server from time to time.
*Adjust portal security settings*: restrict access using IP whitelisting, specify trusted mail domains, set password length and more.
*Enable 2-factor authentication* via SMS or authenticator app.
*Use LDAP for access centralization*. Easily import the necessary users and groups from your LDAP server (e.g. OpenLDAP Server or Microsoft Active Directory) to your portal.
*Use own SMPT server* and close all the unnecessary ports.
Make your LEXIC more secure now.
$GreenButton

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_welcome_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Customize and manage your LEXIC to make it more comfortable and secure:
$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItem6 $TableItem7 $TableItemsBtm
And that’s not the full list of what you can do!
$GreenButton
Visit our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}" to learn more about customizing your office. Always consult it when you have questions about the functionality and encourage your users to do so.
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: subject_enterprise_admin_welcome_v10
data.value: Make your LEXIC more secure

data.name: subject_enterprise_whitelabel_admin_welcome_v10
data.value: Make your online office more secure

data.name: subject_saas_admin_welcome_v10
data.value: Configure your LEXIC

data.name: pattern_enterprise_user_activation_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
$__AuthorName has invited you to join your company's safe and secure web-office that would enhance your collaboration. Its address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
Accept the invitation by clicking the link:
$GreenButton
The link is only valid for 7 days.
You will get more tips on how to use your we-office. You can cancel the subscriptions on your Profile page at any moment as well as re-enable them.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_user_welcome_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Your user profile has been successfully added to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Now you can:
# Create and edit "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/", share them with teammates, and collaborate in real time. # Add your email accounts and manage all correspondence in one place with "Mail":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/mail/". # Manage your workflow with "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" and your customer relationships using "CRM":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/crm/". # Use "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to start your blogs, forums, add events, share bookmarks. # Organize your work schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/". # Use "Chat":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to exchange instant messages.
$GreenButton

data.name: pattern_enterprise_whitelabel_user_activation_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
$__AuthorName has invited you to join your company's safe and secure web-office that would enhance your collaboration. Its address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
Accept the invitation by clicking the link:
$GreenButton
The link is only valid for 7 days.
You will get more tips on how to use your we-office. You can cancel the subscriptions on your Profile page at any moment as well as re-enable them.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_whitelabel_user_welcome_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Your user profile has been successfully added to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Now you can:
# Create and edit "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/", share them with teammates, and collaborate in real time. # Add your email accounts and manage all correspondence in one place with "Mail":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/mail/". # Manage your workflow with "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" and your customer relationships using "CRM":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/crm/". # Use "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to start your blogs, forums, add events, share bookmarks. # Organize your work schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/". # Use "Chat":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to exchange instant messages.
$GreenButton

data.name: pattern_saas_user_activation_v10
data.value:
Hello!
You are invited to join LEXIC at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Accept the invitation by clicking the link:
$GreenButton
We will also send you useful tips, latest LEXIC news and special offers once in a while. You can cancel the subscriptions on your Profile page at any moment as well as re-enable them.
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_user_welcome_v10
data.value:
Hello!
Welcome to LEXIC! Your user profile has been successfully added to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Now you can:
# Create and edit "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/", share them with teammates, and collaborate in real time. # Add your email accounts and manage all correspondence in one place with "Mail":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/mail/". # Manage your workflow with "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" and your customer relationships using "CRM":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/crm/". # Use "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to start your blogs, forums, add events, share bookmarks. # Organize your work schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/". # Use "Chat":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to exchange instant messages.
$GreenButton
If you need help, browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}" or ask our "support team":"https://support.lexic.xyz".
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
You can customize LEXIC for your needs, for example:
$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm
$GreenButton
Done. It's time to invite teammates to your web-office!
More information in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_invite_teammates_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Your cloud office is ready at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". It's time to invite your teammates!
The easiest way to add your team is to import the necessary users and groups from an LDAP Server (e.g. OpenLDAP Server or Microsoft Active Directory). The LDAP settings are available in your Control Panel. Instructions are available in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}/server/windows/community/ldap-settings.aspx".
You can also distribute the invitation link using the Invite users to portal option or add your teammates manually one by one using the *Create New...* button in the *People* module or export users from: "your Yahoo or Google account":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-web.aspx"; "your mail client address book":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-mail-client.aspx"; "a CSV file":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-csv.aspx".

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_without_activity_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
We hope you enjoy using LEXIC. How everything is going with your trial? We would really appreciate you feedback!
Please, don’t hesitate to contact us at "support.lexic.xyz":"https://support.lexic.xyz" whenever you have questions or ideas.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_payment_warning_before7_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Please note that your LEXIC subscription is about to expire in a week. To extend your subscription, you need to purchase a product renewal for LEXIC.
Click on the link below to start the renewal process: "Pricing page":"$PricingPage"
For any further LEXIC installation, activation and technical support issues, please contact our support team at "https://support.lexic.xyz/":"https://support.lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_trial_warning_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Thanks for choosing LEXIC. You trial expires today. To continue using it, purchase the full license.
Buy now: "https://www.lexic.xyz/enterprise-edition.aspx":"https://www.lexic.xyz/enterprise-edition.aspx"
For any purchase questions, contact us at "sales@lexic.xyz":"mailto:sales@lexic.xyz". For solving any technical problems, write to "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_trial_warning_before7_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Thanks for choosing LEXIC. We just want to remind you that the trial period for your Enterprise Edition will be over in seven days.
Please, check all the available pricing plans for Enterprise Edition and choose the most suitable one for your business.
$GreenButton
$BlueButton
For any purchase questions, contact us at "sales@lexic.xyz":"mailto:sales@lexic.xyz". For solving any technical problems, write to "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_invite_teammates_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
The cloud office is ready at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". It's time to invite your teammates!
The easiest way to do that is to distribute the invitation link using the *Invite users to portal* option.
$GreenButton
You can also add your teammates manually one by one using the *Create New...* button in the *People* module or export users from: "your Yahoo or Google account":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-web.aspx", "your mail client address book":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-mail-client.aspx", "a CSV file":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-csv.aspx".
Learn more about adding users in our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_user_apps_tips_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Get free LEXIC apps to work on documents and projects from any of your devices.
# To work on documents offline on Windows, Linux and Mac, download "LEXIC Desktop Editors":"https://www.lexic.xyz/apps.aspx". # To edit documents on mobile devices, LEXIC Documents app for "iOS":"https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lexic-documents/id944896972" or "Android":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lexic.documents". # To manage your team performance on the go, get LEXIC Projects for "iOS":"https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lexic-projects/id1353395928".
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_user_docs_tips_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
We hope you enjoy using LEXIC editors. Here are some tips on how to make it more effective.
$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItem6 $TableItem7 $TableItemsBtm
$GreenButton
By the way, have you noticed using the most powerful editors in the cloud? Compare to other online editors to "learn more":"https://www.lexic.xyz/document-editor-comparison.aspx".
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_user_comfort_tips_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
We have prepared several tips to make your work with LEXIC more comfortable.
*#1 Find quick answers about LEXIC functionality*
Browse "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}" when you are not sure how to perform your task. The answers to the most popular question like "how to import contacts to CRM":"${__HelpLink}/guides/import-contacts.aspx" or "how to export data from CRM":"${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/crm-export.aspx", or "how to add a recurring event":"${__HelpLink}/guides/add-recurring-event.aspx" can easily be found there.
*#2 Don’t forget about 3rd party extensions*
LEXIC functionality can be enhanced with 3rd party extensions. For example, you can easily publish documents on your WordPress website thanks to WordPress integration or e-sign your documents with DocuSign. "Find out more >>":"${__HelpLink}/server/windows/community/authorization-keys.aspx"
*#3 Manage your subscriptions*
You’ll get notified about shared docs, projects updates, and your colleagues birthdays. Switch notifications on and off on your Profile page. Pick those that are useful for you and choose whether you want to get them via email, Chat, or both. You can also unsubscribe from these emails with tips and tricks there or, vice versa, re-enable them. "Learn more >>":"${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/managing-subscriptions.aspx"
*#4 Request special training*
To get a real quick start with LEXIC, ask us to teach your whole team to use all the modules and features. This is a paid option. "Contact us >>":"https://support.lexic.xyz"
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_trial_warning_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
The trial period for your portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" is due to expire today. To continue using it "buy subscription":"$PricingPage".
*Note*: you can deploy LEXIC on your private network to get full control over your data. "Learn more":"https://www.lexic.xyz/server-solutions.aspx"
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_trial_warning_before5_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
The trial period for your account at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" will be over in 5 days.
*Buy a subscription today with 10% off!*
Just use this coupon code while purchasing: *$Coupon*
It will be valid within the next 10 days. At this moment the number of active users in the portal is $ActiveUsers.
We recommend you a $$Price/$PricePeriod plan.
$GreenButton
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: subject_saas_admin_trial_warning_v10
data.value: Your LEXIC Trial Expires Today

data.name: subject_saas_admin_trial_warning_before5_v10
data.value: Use this discount before your trial ends

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_trial_warning_after5_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Didn’t manage to have a closer look at LEXIC? Extend your trial today! Even more - pay less if your decision is quick and positive!
Get 20 additional days of the trial or a 20% discount on 1 or 3-year subscription. You will be able to use the discount within 5 days after receiving this message.
$GreenButton
You can also deploy LEXIC on your private network to get full control over your data. "Learn more":"https://www.lexic.xyz/server-solutions.aspx"
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: subject_saas_admin_trial_warning_after5_v10
data.value: Extend your LEXIC trial and get discounts

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_payment_after_monthly_subscriptions_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Earlier you have paid for a monthly subscription. If you are planning to continue using LEXIC, we recommend you purchasing longer subscriptions.
Here’s our special offer - use this coupon *10%discountyear* to get 10% discount on 1-year subscription or this one *upgradethreeyears20%* to buy 3-year subscription with 20% off.
$GreenButton
If you need assistance, contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz". We will be happy to help!
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_payment_warning_after1_v10
data.value:
Your LEXIC subscription has expired. Renew your LEXIC subscription to continue using it.
$GreenButton
Enable the "Auto-renew" license option to automatically renew your license at expiration time and never worry about your payment time again. You can disable it any time "here":"https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/?lang=en&e=example@customer-email.com&k=xxxxxxxxxx"
For payment related issues, contact Avangate at "support@avangate.com":"mailto:support@avangate.com"
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_payment_warning_before5_v10
data.value:
Your LEXIC subscription is about to expire in 5 days. Renew your LEXIC subscription to continue using it.
$GreenButton
Enable the "Auto-renew" license option to automatically renew your license at expiration time and never worry about your payment time again. You can disable it any time "here":"https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/?lang=en&e=example@customer-email.com&k=xxxxxxxxxx":"https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/?lang=en&e=example@customer-email.com&k=xxxxxxxxxx".
For payment related issues, contact Avangate at "support@avangate.com":"mailto:support@avangate.com"
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_trial_warning_after30_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
You haven’t added any teammates, so maybe LEXIC Personal suits you more? It free and you will be able to:
# Work with text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations. # Share docs with your friends and collaborate on them in real-time. # Embed documents to your web page. # Connect 3rd party cloud storage like Dropbox or Google Drive to manage docs from one place.
To get a quick start, sign up via your Facebook or Google account.
$GreenButton
You can also install this "Chrome extension":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/lexic-personal/ohdlcmpahmacjddiaokoogleflddlahc?hl=en-US" to get quick access to LEXIC Personal or "this application":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/lexic-personal/iohfebkcjhlelaoibebeohcgkohkcgpn" to use LEXIC editors within Google Drive.
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: subject_saas_admin_payment_after_monthly_subscriptions_v10
data.value: Your special offer for LEXIC

data.name: subject_saas_admin_payment_warning_after1_v10
data.value: LEXIC renewal notification

data.name: subject_saas_admin_payment_warning_before5_v10
data.value: Renew LEXIC subscription

data.name: subject_saas_admin_trial_warning_after30_v10
data.value: Switch to free LEXIC Personal

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_trial_warning_after_half_year_v10
data.value:
You haven't entered your LEXIC "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" for more than half a year. Since you have decided not to use it anymore, your web-office and all the data will be deleted in accordance with "our Privacy statement":"https://help.lexic.xyz/products/files/doceditor.aspx?fileid=5048502&doc=SXhWMEVzSEYxNlVVaXJJeUVtS0kyYk14YWdXTEFUQmRWL250NllHNUFGbz0_IjUwNDg1MDIi0".
We would appreciate your feedback. Why have you decided to stop using LEXIC?
$GreenButton
If you think this is a mistake and want to continue using LEXIC, please contact our "support team":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz".
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"http://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: subject_saas_admin_trial_warning_after_half_year_v10
data.value: Your LEXIC will be deleted

Dear $UserName,
The process of reassign data from user "$FromUserName":"$FromUserLink" to user "$ToUserName":"$ToUserLink" has been successfully completed.
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.^

data.name: subject_reassigns_completed
data.value: ${LetterLogoText}. Reassigns user data is completed

data.name: ItemCoAuthoringDocuments
data.value: Explore different ways of co-authoring documents - real-time co-editing, chat, comments, review.

data.name: ItemShareDocuments
data.value: Share documents with your teammates.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10_item_3rdparty_hdr
data.value: Tip #5: Connect 3rd-party services

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal_v10_item_3rdparty
data.value: Let your team members use Facebook, Twitter, Google or LinkedIn to sign in. Link up your portal with Box, Dropbox, OneDrive and Google to transfer your documents. Connect DocuSign to use e-signature, Twilio - for VoIP, Bitly - to shorten links and Firebase to get notifications when you're offline.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_user_apps_tips_v10
data.value:
Hello, $UserName!
Get free LEXIC apps to work on documents and projects from any of your devices.
# To work on documents offline on Windows, Linux and Mac, download "LEXIC Desktop Editors":"https://www.lexic.xyz/apps.aspx". # To edit documents on mobile devices, LEXIC Documents app for "iOS":"https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lexic-documents/id944896972" or "Android":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lexic.documents". # To manage your team performance on the go, get LEXIC Projects for "iOS":"https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lexic-projects/id1353395928".

data.name: subject_enterprise_admin_user_apps_tips_v10

data.name: ButtonStartFreeTrial
data.value: Start free trial

data.name: pattern_opensource_admin_activation
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
You have just created your LEXIC portal, your safe and secure web office. Your portal address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Follow the link below to confirm your email address:
$GreenButton
Please, complete your email activation within a week as the link is valid for 7 days only.
Note: we do not send out confidential information (like your password) in emails for safety reasons. You may change your email or password in your "Profile page":"$MyStaffLink".
To send notifications, we use the SMTP settings of our default mail server. To change them, please follow the instructions here.
For more information we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"https://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_opensource_admin_docs_tips
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
In almost every business we are to deal with documents every day - contracts, reports, white papers, invoices, etc. - and waste a lot of time moving it around. To help you work more efficiently and reduce time and efforts spent on paperwork, make use of these 7 simple tips and tricks.
$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItem6 $TableItem7 $TableItemsBtm
Do you know that you're using the most powerful online editors in the world? Want to know why LEXIC is better than MS Office Online, Google Docs or Collabora? "Look here":"https://www.lexic.xyz/document-editor-comparison.aspx"
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"https://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: pattern_opensource_admin_security_tips
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Data security is a burning issue for most teams, especially when it comes to documents. To affirm LEXIC transparency and reliability we have opened its source code that is available on "GitHub":"https://github.com/LEXIC".
To make it even more secure:
# Turn on HTTPS to keep your portal data secure; # Backup your portal data on a regular basis to avoid any data-loss; # Track history of login attempts.
Control Panel included into LEXIC Enterprise Edition allows you to automate these processes and do even more: change the default portal logos, import users from your LDAP server, check for available LEXIC updates.
Got interested? Start free 30-day trial of the LEXIC Enterprise Edition:
$GreenButton
For more information we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, LEXIC Team "www.lexic.xyz":"https://lexic.xyz/"

data.name: subject_opensource_admin_activation
data.value: Welcome to LEXIC!

data.name: subject_opensource_admin_docs_tips
data.value: 7 Tips and Tricks to Work More Effectively in LEXIC Documents

data.name: subject_opensource_admin_security_tips
data.value: Easy Way to Make Your Portal More Secure

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips1
data.value: Tip #1. Use the Real-time Co-editing feature to speed up the interaction process when specifying details or proofreading a document. Choose between two co-editing modes - Fast when you see changes as your co-author is typing or Strict when the changes are shown only after saving the document.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips2
data.value: Tip #2. Use the Version History option to check the changes made to a file by you and your teammates or see who made the specific edits.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips3
data.value: Tip #3. Use the Review feature to avoid manual tracking changes and merging. Grant a quick access to your document for reviewing and let others suggest changes without actually editing the document. Easily accept or reject suggested changes.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips4
data.value: Tip #4. Share documents with other users or people. Attach documents as links to your email to reduce the mail traffic.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips5
data.value: Tip #5. Use the Mail Merge function to create a set of personalized messages or a templates and save time you usually spend on writing the same text several times.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips6
data.value: Tip #6. Download free LEXIC Desktop Editors to work on documents without Internet connection. Note that the app can be connected to your LEXIC portal to access documents stored there.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips7
data.value: Tip #7. Download LEXIC Documents app and install it on your iOS device to work with documents anywhere, anytime, even on the go.

data.name: pattern_personal_activate
data.value:
Hello, $UserName You’ve been successfully registered at LEXIC Personal "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
Connect your favorite cloud storage: Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive or Box to create a single workspace for your documents accessible from anywhere.
Learn more about LEXIC Personal in "our blog":"$TagBlogLink".
We're glad you're here. Stay tuned!
Sincerely, LEXIC team

data.name: pattern_personal_after_registration1
pattern_personal_after_registration14
pattern_personal_after_registration21
pattern_personal_after_registration28
pattern_personal_after_registration7
data.value:
$PersonalHeaderStart Connect your favorite cloud storage to LEXIC $PersonalHeaderEnd
It has been a week since you created your cloud office, so we believe it's time to unveil some beneficial features you might have missed.
Connect *Dropbox*, *Google Drive*, *Box*, *OneDrive*, *Nextcloud*, *ownCloud* or *Yandex.Disk* to LEXIC and create a single document management space for all your documents. You'll be able to edit external files in LEXIC and save them to the storage you keep documents in. Read details about connecting file storages to LEXIC "here":"${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/add-resource.aspx".
You can also integrate LEXIC editors into Google Drive using our "connector app":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/lexic-personal/iohfebkcjhlelaoibebeohcgkohkcgpn".
Need more of document management?
h3.Try LEXIC for business "in the cloud":"https://www.lexic.xyz/cloud-office.aspx" or "on your server":"https://www.lexic.xyz/server-solutions.aspx" for free for 30 days and check out extended document management opportunities together with a business toolset:
- Manage team documents in projects;
- Integrate documents with CRM and Email;
- Share files to groups of users;
- Optimize your workflow with team communication tools.
Interested? Learn more about "LEXIC for business":"http://www.lexic.xyz/document-management.aspx".
Sincerely, LEXIC team

data.name: pattern_personal_change_email
data.value:
You have requested to change your email address used to enter the ${LetterLogoText} portal.
Please follow the link below to change your email address:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your email or received this email by mistake, please ignore it.
Sincerely, LEXIC team

data.name: pattern_personal_change_password
data.value:
There has been a request to change your password used to enter the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
Please follow the link below to change your password:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the password change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your password or received this email by mistake, please ignore it.
Sincerely, LEXIC team

data.name: pattern_personal_confirmation
data.value:
Hello,
you've just registered an account at the LEXIC solution for personal use. Click "here":"$InviteLink" to confirm the registration and create a password.
If you can't open the link, please copy the following "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink" and paste it into your browser address bar.
Sincerely, LEXIC team

data.value:
You have requested a termination of your account at personal.lexic.xyz. Follow the link to complete the request (the link is active for a 7-day period):
$GreenButton
*Note*: After the deletion, your account and all data associated with it will be erased permanently in accordance with our "Privacy statement":"https://help.lexic.xyz/products/files/doceditor.aspx?fileid=5048502&doc=SXhWMEVzSEYxNlVVaXJJeUVtS0kyYk14YWdXTEFUQmRWL250NllHNUFGbz0_IjUwNDg1MDIi0".
Ignore this email if you do not want to proceed.
If you have any questions, please contact us at "support@lexic.xyz":"mailto:support@lexic.xyz"
Sincerely, LEXIC team

Dear $UserName,
You have been invited to join your company's safe and secure web-office that would enhance your collaboration. Its address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Adding this link to your bookmarks is a good idea, you are likely to use it a lot.
Accept the invitation by following the link below and use your login and password from the corporate account to sign in.
$GreenButton
The link is only valid for 7 days.

data.name: pattern_profile_has_deleted_itself
data.value:
User "$FromUserName":"$FromUserLink" has deleted his/her profile, and this profile is now blocked. All user’s files are still assigned to him/her and occupy disk space.
You can reassign the user’s documents shared with others to another active user or remove them to free up the portal disk space.
Please go to the user profile using "this link":"$FromUserLink" to reassign documents to another user or remove the data.

data.name: subject_profile_has_deleted_itself
data.value: User has deleted his/her profile
